timeline.message:
Improve freeze alert broadcast
* Adds an interactive click to reverse freeze action

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Is this mixed up?
Constuctor calls for senderName, targetName. Seems like you are sending targetName and then senderName rn
Also considered just having a constructor MatchPlayer sender, MatchPlayer target, boolean frozen ?
so a method Component createInteractiveFreezeBroadcast could be something like
 return TextComponent.builder()
.append(
              TranslatableComponent.of(
                  String.format("moderation.freeze.broadcast.%s", frozen ? "frozen" : "thaw"),
                  TextColor.GRAY,
                  sender.getName(NameStyle.CONCISE),
                  target.getName(NameStyle.CONCISE))
          .hoverEvent(
              HoverEvent.showText(
                  TranslatableComponent.of("moderation.freeze.broadcast.hover", TextColor.GRAY)))
          .clickEvent(ClickEvent.runCommand("/f " + target.getBukkit().getName())
          .build();
The thing i think is weird is passing a targetName and a username
